thread.title: Power failure reduces services on Nottingham trams
thread.title_full: Power failure reduces services on Nottingham trams | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Power failure reduces services on Nottingham trams
text:
There is a reduced service on the Nottingham Express Transit tram network, because of a power failure.
There was a full shut down of the service, but trams are now running from Pheonix Park to Clifton. The Hucknall service is only running as far as the NG2 business park.
Last updated Sat 17 Oct 2015 Travel Nottingham East Midlands Nottingham Trams
